admin/editor.product-quantity.title: Product Quantity component
admin/editor.product-quantity.descriptio: A component that allows user to select the amount of items to add to cart
admin/editor.product-quantity.warningQua: Only show the quantity of remaining items in stock if item available quantity is less than or equal to the value passed in this property
admin/editor.product-quantity.showUnit.t: Unit of measure in the quantity selector
admin/editor.product-quantity.showUnit.d: Show or hide unit of measure in the quantity selector
